channel.title: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide
channel.description: I need the code and where to put it in. I have the right interface for everything but when i click make armour, nothing happens...

item.title: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

I don’t quite understand that. I’m sorry. I consider myself intermediate in some places and like newbie state in other areas. This being one of them…

item.title: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

In simpler terms, if you only use the methods ‘usedWith’ and ‘itemUsed’ and do not invoke any other methods under the if-statement, no dialogue nor interface will appear.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide

item.title: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

Ok Thanks Vain, just one more question though. In UseItem.java, there is a direct command to make the item without any dialouge or interfaces. Where would i put in so to speak a statement to make the item through the dragonhide interface that is already in my server?

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Code for making Range armour out of Dragon Hide
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Cres, post:7, topic:384670”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=480433.msg3517590#msg3517590 date=1299123147]
I have looked in all the spots i can on the pi base and can’t find it. ItemAssistant.java, clickingbuttons.java, actionhandler.java. This is one part i havent explored and i need work in.
[/quote]

Java is not a PI source -.-’
Looking at tutorials isn’t Java either…

write me a single JFrame with a text saying “I can use Swing” using JLabel
name the JLabel iCanCode
if you can do this i will believe you[/quote]

looks at control panel tutorial
